backend/main.mo: Defines transform passthrough and an HTTPS‑validated link‑preview fetch using OutCall.httpGetRequest.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for build analysis.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes the full site layout with themed sections and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with branding, quick links, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/ImageOpenInNewTa: Reusable image component that opens the source in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/LinkPreview.tsx: Fetches and displays link preview cards with loading, fallback, and success states.
frontend/src/components/MarqueeLinkPrevi: Creates a looping marquee of link previews with duplicated URLs for seamless scrolling.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navbar with smooth-scroll navigation, a logo, desktop links, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioDetails: Empty placeholder component with no content.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with biography text and buttons to download a CV or view a portfolio.
frontend/src/components/sections/AskMyNa: Section showcasing example prompts and a button that scrolls users to the contact form.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form with validation, email composition, clipboard copying, and direct contact info.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Maps and displays experience items with images, roles, periods, descriptions, and achievement lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Full-screen hero with background image, headline, subheadline, body text, and CTA buttons for navigation.
frontend/src/components/sections/MarketN: Market Notes section with writing topics, a marquee of links, and buttons to browse or subscribe.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Empty placeholder section with no content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Section: Reusable section header component supporting title, subtitle, and alignment options.
frontend/src/components/sections/Selecte: Renders a grid of featured 'signal' cards with titles, descriptions, and optional link previews. Maps over static signal data to display cards with external links.
frontend/src/components/sections/Selects: Displays a grid of featured work items using selectsContent, showing images, metadata, tags, and external project links. Uses cards and badges for structured presentation.
frontend/src/content/aboutContent.ts: Exports static about-page text containing three descriptive paragraphs about background and work focus.
frontend/src/content/aurientExperienceCo: Defines an ExperienceItem interface and exports a list of experience entries with roles, periods, descriptions, highlights, and images.
frontend/src/content/aurientSelectsConte: Defines a SelectItem interface and exports a list of curated project entries with descriptions, tags, images, and metadata.
frontend/src/content/marketNotesWritingL: Exports an array of external URLs pointing to writing and articles.
frontend/src/content/portfolioData.ts: Deprecated file exporting an empty array placeholder for portfolio data.
frontend/src/content/servicesData.ts: Deprecated file exporting an empty array placeholder for services data.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Contains site-wide static content including hero text, section titles, and subtitles used across the UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authenticated Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and related status through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkPreview.ts: Fetches link preview data via backend actor using React Query, parsing responses and caching results.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode overrides, custom utilities, and visual effects like neon glows and marquee animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/categoryLabels.ts: Maps verbose category strings to concise labels (AI, ART, TECH, CRYPTO, CULTURE) and provides helper functions for retrieving them.
frontend/src/utils/contactMessage.ts: Formats contact form input into a plaintext message string.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and theme extensions using project-specific CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests for UI updates matching aurient.ai’s styling.
